question: "Eight-Nation Alliance" was a military coalition of Germany, Japan, Russia, Britain, France, USA, Italy and Austria-Hungary formed against which nation?
explanation: The "Eight-Nation Alliance" was a military coalition of Germany, Japan, Russia, Britain, France, USA, Italy and Austria-Hungary formed in 1900 against Chinese Boxer Rebels, who were supported by the then rulers of China, the Qing dynasty. This alliance was formed to protect the legations and Christain missionaries of China against the attack of Chinese Boxer Rebels. This alliance found victory against Boxers.
